ul.li: Easy participation in tech events: AXE CODE makes attending technical events simple and accessible, whether through real-world physical attendance or virtual participation from anywhere.

Staying updated with the latest in technology: Events allow members to explore new advancements in technology and computer science, keeping them informed about emerging tools, trends, and innovations.
Learning from industry leaders: Developers can directly learn from experts, innovators, and pioneers in the field, gaining valuable insights that support their professional growth.

Understanding the future of tech: Events provide forward-looking perspectives from professionals who understand the direction of the industry, helping members develop a clear vision of upcoming opportunities and challenges.
Live event broadcasting: Members can join live streams of events, enabling real-time participation for those who cannot attend physically.
Group chat for event participants: A dedicated group chat is available for everyone attending the event, allowing discussions, idea-sharing, and engagement before, during, and after the event.
Pre-event comments and discussions: Users can share opinions, expectations, and questions in the event timeline before it starts, encouraging early engagement and community interaction.
